RULES.description:
# Rules
1.) Respect each other. No bullying, toxicity, or exclusion.

2.) Use channels correctly. Read channel descriptions before using them.

3.) No spamming. Do not spam in any form, as this will result in an automatic tempmute.

4.) No advertising. Only self-promote in <#801574076011249784>.

5.) No discrimination of any kind including sexism, racism, homophobia, or any other forms of discrimination.

6.) Mild profanity is fine, but do not excessively curse.

7.) Be kind

8.) No NSFW content including, but not limited to pornography and other forms of inappropriate content.

9.) No inappropriate nicknames, usernames, or profile pictures.

10.) Use your common sense. Do not try to find loopholes.

We uphold the [**Discord Terms of Service**](https://discord.com/terms)

INFO_1.description:
# Information
Welcome to the Tactical Enforcement Strategic Enforcement Agency's server! (It's a mouthful; We're working on that) This server is a hub for people with different hobbies to meet one another! From gaming to coding to designing, we've got it all! Here's some helpful information below!

INFO_2.description:
## What is T.E.S.L.A.?
The Tactical Enforcement Strategic Logistics Agency (TESLA) is the United State's domestic and foreign agency tasked with counter-terrorism, intelligence, counter-intelligence, security, and cyber-security.

SWATTEAM.description:
## T.E.S.L.A. S.W.A.T. Team
To apply, you must meet all of the requirements below:

- Be 16 year old or older
- Speak English fluently
- Be mature
- Have the <@&1089410274538303559> role
- Own [Ready or Not](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1144200/Ready_or_Not)

 If all of the requirements are met, fill out the form below.

CREW.title: T.E.S.L.A. Bravo Team
CREW.description:
`Operation Mercury Extinction`

Looking for agents to join the Tactical Enforcement Strategic Logistics Agency's Bravo Team in an undercover in Jailbreak Island.

We’re a chill crew mostly for grinding and a bit of crew battles.

**Requirements**
- 13+
- Mature
- Speak English fluently
- Be decent at PvP
- Own the Blackhawk
- Be in North American timezones
  - NAW Servers (Preferred)
- Be able to voice chat in Discord (Preferred)
